Class GridGroups

java.lang.Object
GridGroups
public class GridGroups extends Object
The objects of GridGroups class represent a set of groups of cells of a square grid. Each object has a fixed number of groups that are sequentially numbered, starting at 1. All groups are disjoint, i.e., each cell of the grid belongs at most to one group.

      public void addSquareToGroup(int r, int c, int group)
      Adds the square to a group.
      Parameters:
      r - the square's row
      c - the square's column
      group - the group number
      Requires:
      1 <= r && r <= size() && 1 <= c && c <= size(), 1 <= group && group <= numberOfGroups()
